metadata.title: CVE-2024-47761 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GLPI is a free asset and IT management software package. Starting inversion 0.80 and prior to version 10.0.17, an administrator with access tothe sent notifications contents can take control of an account with higherprivileges. Version 10.0.17 contains a patch for this issue.

criterions.comment: glpi package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
